songs.title: ​​what are you so afraid of
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
What are you so afraid of?
Is it love or wasting your time?
What are you so afraid of?
Is it love or wasting your time?

[Post-Chorus]
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh

[Chorus]
What are you so afraid of?
Is it love or wasting your time?
What are you so afraid of?
Is it love or wasting your time?

[Post-Chorus]
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
Ooh-ooh, ooh-ooh
